content:
att.edition

provides attributes identifying the source edition from which some encoded feature derives.
Moduletei â€” Declarations for classes, datatypes, and macros available to all TEI modules
Memberscb gb lb milestone pb refState
Attributes
@ed
supplies a sigil or other arbitrary identifier for the source edition in which the associated feature (for example, a page, column, or line break) occurs at this point in the text.
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.word
@edRef
provides a pointer to the source edition in which the associated feature (for example, a page, column, or line break) occurs at this point in the text.
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.pointer
